thread.title: Five Proven Approaches to EHR Test Planning
thread.title_full: Five Proven Approaches to EHR Test Planning

title: Five Proven Approaches to EHR Test Planning
text:
31 Five Proven Approaches to EHR Test Planning 
Healthcare Informatics: With the complexity of electronic health record (EHR) implementations and accelerated timelines, some organizations wait to consider what is needed for testing until it is time to start. Lack of adequate planning can leave your organization at risk, delaying implementation because of issues with functionality, end user acceptance, or patient safety concerns from inaccurate or incomplete workflows.
